p.codeblock: public abstract int setLocalVoiceReverb(Constants.AUDIO_REVERB_TYPE reverbKey, int value);
virtual int setLocalVoiceReverb(AUDIO_REVERB_TYPE reverbKey, int value) = 0;
public abstract int SetLocalVoiceReverb(AUDIO_REVERB_TYPE reverbKey, int value);
Future<void> setLocalVoiceReverb( {required AudioReverbType reverbKey, required int value});

section.title: Details
section.p: The SDK provides an easier-to-use method, , to directly implement preset reverb effects for such as pop, R&B, and KTV.
section.note: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

pt.props: android cpp unreal bp unity flutter rn electron cs

plentry.pd: The reverberation key. Agora provides five reverberation keys, see .
The value of the reverberation key.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; and you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.

li.props: native unreal bp electron unity rn cs
